A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't watch a single trailer and purposefully kept away from media in order to go into this movie as fresh as possible. What a disgrace. This film was sloppy\, loosely written\, and didn't fit the overall tone of the beloved Star Wars movies. Expecy cheap humor and a lousy plot that makes sense in the movie\, but not the overall arc of the Saga. I wish Disney and Rian Johnson actually knew what we the fans wanted. It seems underdeveloped characters and forced narratives are their version of a great Star Wars film.  I feel sorry I ever spoke ill of the prequels because at this point in the trilogy\, Gungans wouldnt be half bad.
